extendedInfo.description: Wisepilot offers you an efficient, outstanding and award winning search, map and navigation app. Enjoy a free trial of all premium navigation, search and map services for 5 days!FREE WISEPILOT FEATURES YOU CAN USE ALL THE TIME:- Worldwide maps - from continents down to street level.- Find places nearby any destination, e.g. the closest pharmacy or best local Italian restaurant- Share your places with friends and family via Facebook, Twitter, mail or sms- Search for a street address, person*, business**, intersection or even coordinates - See your route on the map and get text instructions â perfect when you are exploring a city by foot- Quickly get distance and estimated travel time to where you want to goWith Wisepilot all the maps and navigation data is stored in the cloud. We offer automatically updates to all our customers for free, you never have to worry about navigating on outdated maps again. Wisepilot gives you quality maps from NAVTEQ for the best navigation experience all over the world.Features with Wisepilot GPS Navigator â enjoy 5 days for free during your trial period:â¢ Voice guidance - live instructions for how to proceed to your destination.â¢ Lane Assistance â get in the right lane as you approach an intersection.â¢ Junction Views â prepare your motorway exit in advance with a guiding display. â¢ Speed Limits/Alerts â displays speed limits while driving and alerts if you exceed the limit. â¢ Speed Cameras â be alerted when approaching a speed camera.â¢ Live Traffic â up-to-date traffic info helps you plan your trip. Avoid queues, accidents, road closures and other incidents.â¢ Route of your choice â the shortest route isnât always the best, choose between multiple options e.g. avoid motorways, fastest and easiest.â¢ Night Colors - day and night mode for navigation.â¢ 3D worldwide maps - always automatically updated and synchronized with your phoneâ¢ Abroad Mode â reduces data usage by limiting functionality.â¢ Follow Me â share your trip and let friends follow you in real time with updated map and arrival time.â¢ My Trips - view and edit your finished trips. â¢ 2D Worldwide Maps - always automatically updated and synchronized with your phone.â¢ One Line Search â assist you to find nearby places, persons*, businesses** and addresses.â¢ Nearby â find places within different categories e.g. Parking and Eating & Drinking.â¢ Destination Details â find a place and automatically view the distance and travel time.â¢ Weather â five day forecasts for any destination in the world.â¢ Share Places â tell your friends about your favorite places by SMS, e-mail, Facebook or TwitterAfter the trial, all these features are available for purchase in Wisepilotâs in-app shop***.Extra content available in our in-app shop:â¢ WCities â find current and upcoming events near you. Access info about places and events worldwide.â¢ My Maps - Store 2D maps on your phone and reduce data usage, great functionality when traveling abroad. User Forum:http://www.appello.com/forum/Customer support:support.wisepilot@wisepilot.comMore information about Wisepilot:http://www.appello.com/wisepilothttp://www.youtube.com/appellosystemshttps://www.facebook.com/appellosystems* Only in Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Austria, Germany, Netherlands** Only in United Kingdom, United States, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Finland, Austria, Germany, Netherlands***Check service availability in Wisepilotâs in-app shop

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: I bought it and it asked me to buy more things like the map and all other extras. Instead of letting the user know straight away that certain things are not free it only lets you know that once you actually pay the $20 for the whole year. Not happy with this.
reviews.author: Zvjezdan Rodic

reviews.title: Just Terrible!
reviews.comment: Crashes and Wipes data too frequently! Unreliable and their support, well what support? One wonders do they even understand English? Totally disgusted.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only a five day trial!!
reviews.comment: My phone came with a badass app and all of a sudden it wasnt on mine or my husbands phone. I only realized it was gone when my mom n i were stuck on a highway with no gas! Scary situation. Been trying to find one but so far no luck
reviews.author: Ashlyn Peel

reviews.title: Ultimate Navigator
reviews.comment: Very good.  Want to go for the full version.
reviews.author: Plaboni Mukherjee

reviews.title: used to be better
reviews.comment: The direction signs are way too small, it is hard to make them out while driving. Please increase the font at least twice. Occasionally crushes during navigation on android 4.2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better then tom tom
reviews.comment: Great accuracy even on unnamed roads
reviews.author: Ricky Blosser

reviews.title: 10 stars out of 5
reviews.comment: The best nav app ever...accurate and simple with opportunity to find what you want by selecting from many categories and searching by letters and voice
reviews.author: BarQoOoM

reviews.title: Can we please have the female voice instructions guide
reviews.comment: There is no directions list for wisepilot. It would be better if that could be added.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Changing mobiles
reviews.comment: I liked this app, therefore I purchased it on 2 of my phones, it works flawless on the blackberry, but it stutter on HTC ONE X+, recently i updated the HTC device, of course I need to re-purchase the app. though nothing guarantees if the stutter is fixed.
reviews.author: Yanal Shoumenn
